name: Frozen Flame
detailed_description:
Frozen Flame is a hardcore survival ARPG. The fate of the world depends entirely on players. Each dedicated server has its own story, leading orders, and difficulty level.

Cleanse the world of darkness


Dark priests lurk in the shadows. You must hurry to find them and crush them before they awaken their faceless benefactor and destroy the world once and for all! The spirit of the last Valkyrie will show you the way.

Explore an open world


Beyond the walls await forests of giants, twisted labyrinths, floating islands, green oases, and many other unusual locales. You can climb rocks, travel through portals, and even soar through the air to expand your boundaries.

Choose your path


Create a unique character class, using a combination of equipment and attributes. The appearance of your hero will change depending on stats, and the hair grow with experience!

Master the power of the flame


All living things are nourished by a magical flame. You must fight to get it and then sacrifice it to the ancient spirits in exchange for new powers. Use the flame to unlock new skills and craft magical weapons.

Build a shelter


Monsters lurk in every corner, and when night falls everything becomes even more dangerous. Join up with other players to make it through, or build your own settlement! Different structures and traps will help protect against uninvited guests.

Free the prisoners


Some beings in this world have kept their sanity, but they’re being held captive by the dark priests. Save the prisoners and they will live in your settlement and help you take a stand against the forces of evil!

Uncover the secrets of the ancients


Ancient artifacts can be found in the most secluded of corners. The most valuable of them are megaliths, which store pieces of history. Collect all of them to uncover the ancient secrets and melt the ice!

Destroy the demons


The demons that are born deep underground are getting more dangerous. Equip expeditions, stock up on torches, and set off for the lower floors to stop them! Only those who stand united will reign victorious.

Become a leader of an order


Choose one of the nine ancient orders, each of which has its own objectives. Some guard the sacred lands, others hunt for treasure, and some even assist the dark priests in their mission. As your reputation grows, you will get incredible rewards and new abilities for your achievements!

short_description: The last remaining people wake up among the ruins. The planet is freezing over, and no one can remember what happened. You must survive and master the power of the flame with the help of ancient spirits. Team up with other players and set off beyond the walls to fight the demons before it’s too late!
